channel.title: TrisidiaX's 508 - Help Needed!
channel.description:
Alright guys, so Im having these problems in the pictures as they will be posted below, here are the things ive done:
Okay so I started off by changing the no-ip to the one I created and the 127.0.0.1 to my hamachi ip (Ik Hamachi is horrible but oh well)
Then I went off to changing the Gui.java ip "127.0.0.1" to my hamachi as well.
I changed the compile and EconomyReset.java in the source to my jdk 1.6.0_17.
Then went off to the client folder where I did the same thing from the 2. Compile/ 2. Run/ x86 (My computer is a 32bit)
I looked for the classloader.java file along with the rest in that first black screen and couldnt find anything.
Im guessing the source compiler/run are working perfect. (The 2 boxes on the bottom with cyan colored letters)
and the 2 top client compile/run are giving me those errors. any clue what ive missed in between or what I should do ?
Here is the picture:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/195/27351774.jpg/][IMG]http://img195.imageshack.us/img195/9513/27351774.jpg[/img][/URL]

Which is why I just said thats the first thing I always do …
[/quote]

Oh, well you obviously don’t need any help then since you can’t be wrong.[/quote]

item.title: TrisidiaX's 508 - Help Needed!
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

[quote=“Creative I, post:47, topic:472198”][quote author=iBunnie link=topic=589912.msg4179666#msg4179666 date=1355364297]

Well trisidia is better than pvpscape because on pvpscape 10% of the armour is updated and the rest isnt so like updated bandos tasset but not updated chestplate. :l

But dumbass Trisidia has a leech cache, and everytime I try running his client i get the mapConfig.txt error, and I tried millions of options I got and none worked, so I got suggested pvpscapez, and it was working well until yesterday …

What’s wrong with erasedpkz i made my friend a server with erasedpkz…he said it was fine x.x

I had to restart my computer because cmd was wouldnt stop reopening over and over again and I couldnt stop it, it was like spamming my computer and I had no control of my computer, so I give ErasedPkz a thumbs down.

That happened due to you not compiling with your current version of jdk…

well tbh with you, jdk is the first thing I always do in the .bat files, and I always do compile if I do any change … soo I did everything correct and ErasedPkz was just spamming the shit out of my computer like 5 different times.[quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=589912.msg4179373#msg4179373 date=1355345077]

cmd was wouldnt stop reopening over and over again and I couldnt stop it, it was like spamming my computer and I had no control of my computer

Which is why we Right-Click —> Edit Batch files before we execute them.
[/quote]

Which is why I just said thats the first thing I always do …
[/quote]
I’d be glad to prove you wrong over teamviewer :)[/quote]

Well I deleted ErasedPkz, and am not gonna redownload. All I need help with atm is that Im having trouble loggin in, it says something about my not connecting to the server and that I should I try a different world. Any suggestions ?
[/quote]
Are you trying to connect to your own ip? O_O make sure you use 127.0.0.1 for yourself and the hamachi/no-ip for players

Read full topic

item.title: TrisidiaX's 508 - Help Needed!
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:37, topic:472198”][quote author=Creative I link=topic=589912.msg4178707#msg4178707 date=1355271487]

Why would you use a server made by someone who can’t spell “compiling” correctly?

^This kinda made me laugh.

@Creative. You need to make sure the client/server have the same port and the client is connecting to 127.0.0.1
The server has no ip it needs to connect to, as far as I know.

Lmao I saw him that miss spell, and on the source (server) when I run it, it says "Server listening on portal creative-pk.no-ip.biz: 43594. I changed all the client.java no-ips to mine, and also in the source, I changed it into mine, but I dont recall changing any 127.0.0.1 in the source, only changed it in client.java and I just changed it back, but I keep getting the error connecting to server prompt on the log in screen and sometimes it says: “No response from server, try using a different world”
[/quote]
In the client. Have you changed it in the client.
NOT client.java for the server.
In the god damn client.[/quote]

nope, only thing I changed was no-ip in client.java and directed the .java files to my jdk, thats just about it, nothing else

iBunnie:

What’s wrong with erasedpkz i made my friend a server with erasedpkz…he said it was fine x.x

I had to restart my computer because cmd was wouldnt stop reopening over and over again and I couldnt stop it, it was like spamming my computer and I had no control of my computer, so I give ErasedPkz a thumbs down.

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:39, topic:472198”]Well #1 i suggest u dont use pvpscape (i used it and it was a big mistake)
#2 (if u decide to continue) if you change it to a no-ip u have to have portforwarded…[/quote]

Whats wrong with PvPscapez ? Then what do you suggest me using that has the same items as Trisidia and looks as well developed as Trisidia, and I know that I have but I still cant get it online neither can I log in … I have Verizon Fios Gateway, so what do you suggest ?

Read full topic

Im running on java 1.7.0_09, and sk8er as of now, only problem Im having is “Error Connecting To Server”, I’m using PvPscapez, and any idea whats causing that ?
[/quote]
Check to make sure the client is running on the ip of 127.0.0.1[/quote]

The only place I changed the ip was at the client.java file, and I just changed it back, and its still giving me that error, any other way how I can resolve this ?

item.title: TrisidiaX's 508 - Help Needed!
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:30, topic:472198”][quote author=iBunnie link=topic=589912.msg4178506#msg4178506 date=1355259078]

Update yo java to at least 6.0_32

Gave same problem with 32 bro. Any other suggestions ?
[/quote]best jdk:

jdk1.7.0_04

I heard that version gave the webclient’s client class error?

Only if you don’t know how to jar a server correctly. I can jar any server on any version of java (assuming that the signlink isn’t a higher version then the java itself…) and it works…

I dont get why it’s giving that error…

iBunnie, I downloaded another client/source based off TrisidiaX’s and everythings working great except, Im having this problem, any clue how I can resolve the issue ?

Snip

That’s an error because you’re cache isn’t being unpacked correctly.

To be honest man i suggest you get ErasedPkz

ErasedPkz is one of the worst servers, structurally based. It has content, and works. But the innards are nasty.
Plus, I wouldn’t give him the advice to get a new server if one doesn’t work. Really… How does that teach him something?
“My wife’s a bitch, I’ma toss her in the recycle bin and get a new one” is what you just said.

Ermm download java 1.7.0_09 i am using that one and i have no problems what so ever.

Any java V7 or above should be fine. I like using at least 1/2 versions below the standard, so everyone can connect regardless.[/quote]

Im running on java 1.7.0_09, and sk8er as of now, only problem Im having is “Error Connecting To Server”, I’m using PvPscapez, and any idea whats causing that ?

Read full topic

item.title: TrisidiaX's 508 - Help Needed!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“iBunnie, post:24, topic:472198”][quote author=Coldmedicine link=topic=589912.msg4178460#msg4178460 date=1355256305]

[/quote]best jdk:

jdk1.7.0_04

I heard that version gave the webclient’s client class error?[/quote]
Only if you don’t know how to jar a server correctly. I can jar any server on any version of java (assuming that the signlink isn’t a higher version then the java itself…) and it works…

[quote=“Creative I, post:25, topic:472198”][quote author=iBunnie link=topic=589912.msg4178456#msg4178456 date=1355256098]
I dont get why it’s giving that error…
[/quote]

iBunnie, I downloaded another client/source based off TrisidiaX’s and everythings working great except, Im having this problem, any clue how I can resolve the issue ?

Snip[/quote]
That’s an error because you’re cache isn’t being unpacked correctly.

iBunnie:

To be honest man i suggest you get ErasedPkz

ErasedPkz is one of the worst servers, structurally based. It has content, and works. But the innards are nasty.
Plus, I wouldn’t give him the advice to get a new server if one doesn’t work. Really… How does that teach him something?
“My wife’s a bitch, I’ma toss her in the recycle bin and get a new one” is what you just said.

Host Gushers:

Ermm download java 1.7.0_09 i am using that one and i have no problems what so ever.

Any java V7 or above should be fine. I like using at least 1/2 versions below the standard, so everyone can connect regardless.

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: TrisidiaX's 508 - Help Needed!
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

iBunnie:

Alright. Go to C:/TrisidiaX_Cache_V*/maps/ and then go to the bottom there should be one single .txt file. name that as “mapConfig” and we should see positive results.

Thanks bunnie also…Nice quote thingy

“i feel like i dont have a life where can i download one”? That made me rofl.

Read full topic
